title: Jack Cole
content:
Hey guys! I’m really liking this new typophile design. Too bad it won’t email me the password to the old account. But nevermind, I’ll post that bug later.

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/1560975598/ref=dp\_primary-product-display\_0/103-0643650-3095064?%5Fencoding=UTF8&n=507846&s=books](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111214538/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/1560975598/ref=dp_primary-product-display_0/103-0643650-3095064?%5Fencoding=UTF8&n=507846&s=books)

Can someone identify the font on this cover?

Thanks!
author: karenhuang

comments.content: That looks like a Poppl script.

Oh Stewf! Thank you thank you thank you.

Here’s a virtual biscotti for you.

:)
